name: Proficiency in Sustainability at level 6
description: Proficiency in the provision of advice, assistance and leadership to enable the organisation to minimise negative environmental impact.

issuer.name: Institute of Coding
issuer.description: Our mission is to break down barriers to digital learning and employment. We believe learning should be a lifelong process and that everyone has a right to improve their skills. We want to spread opportunity by offering access to education, providing what you need, when you need it, in a place you can reach.

criteria.narrative:
The holder has applied relevant knowledge to demonstrate in a realistic (*) environment that they can perform most of the activities defined in the following SFIA description:  Develops and promotes organisational strategies, policies, standards, and guidelines for sustainability. Leads the introduction and use of sustainability techniques, methodologies and tools.

* Whilst proficiency must be demonstrated in a working context, a workplace supervisor may make a case to justify the use of a professional simulated environment for specific safety-critical tasks.

alignment.targetDescription: The provision of advice, assistance and leadership to enable the organisation to minimise negative environmental impact.
